      Constructor to make a copy of an existing ChessBoard
      ChessBoard(java.lang.String fen)
      Constructor to load a custom game Allows the user to load a game with all the information needed to restart the game from a given position, using Forsyth-Edwards notation Undefined behavior for invalid FEN strings
